languages.text: {n}Визоры кибермастифа многократно мигают, словно пытаются справиться с превосходящим потоком данных. Пес тянется мордой вперед, чуть рыча, но тут же послушно замирает рядом с хозяином.{/n}

{n}The cyber-mastiff's visors flicker continuously, as if he is trying to process an overwhelming influx of data. The dog leans forward with a slight growl, but then obediently goes still again at his master's side.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Визоры кибермастифа многократно мигают, словно пытаются справиться с превосходящим потоком данных. Пес тянется мордой вперед, чуть рыча, но тут же послушно замирает рядом с хозяином.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff's visors keep flickering as trying to process an overwhelming influx of data. The dog leans forward with a slight growl, but then immediately goes still again at his master's side.{/n}

{n}The cyber-mastiff's visors keep flickering as trying to process an overwhelming influx of data. The dog leans forward with a slight growl, but then immediately goes still again at his master's side.{/n}

{n}The cyber-mastiff's visors flicker continuously, as if it is trying to process an overwhelming influx of data. The dog leans forward with a slight growl, but then suddenly goes still again at his master's side.{/n}

{n}The cyber-mastiff's visors flicker continuously, as if it is trying to process an overwhelming influx of data. The dog leans forward with a slight growl, but then suddenly goes still again at his master's side.{/n}

{n}The cyber-mastiff's visors flicker continuously, as if he is trying to process an overwhelming influx of data. The dog leans forward with a slight growl, but then obediently goes still again at his master's side.{/n}

{n}The cyber-mastiff's visors flicker continuously, as if he is trying to process an overwhelming influx of data. The dog leans forward with a slight growl, but then obediently goes still again at his master's side.{/n}

languages.text: {n}格雷托的面甲突然不停地闪烁，似乎在处理大量涌入的数据。它向前倾着身子，低声咆哮了一声，随后安静了下来，乖乖地站在主人身边，一动不动。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff's visors flicker continuously, as if he is trying to process an overwhelming influx of data. The dog leans forward with a slight growl, but then obediently goes still again at his master's side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}格雷托的面甲突然不停地闪烁，似乎在处理大量涌入的数据。它向前倾着身子，低声咆哮了一声，随后安静了下来，乖乖地站在主人身边，一动不动。{/n}
{n}格雷托的面甲突然不停地闪烁，似乎在处理大量涌入的数据。它向前倾着身子，低声咆哮了一声，随后突然安静了下来，站在主人身边一动不动。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los visores del cibermastín parpadean, como si intentara procesar una cantidad abrumadora de datos. El perro se inclina hacia delante y gruñe, pero obedece y permanece inmóvil junto a su amo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff's visors flicker continuously, as if he is trying to process an overwhelming influx of data. The dog leans forward with a slight growl, but then obediently goes still again at his master's side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los visores del cibermastín parpadean, como si intentara procesar una cantidad abrumadora de datos. El perro se inclina hacia delante y gruñe, pero obedece y permanece inmóvil junto a su amo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les visières du cyber-mastiff clignotent, comme s'il tentait d'emmagasiner un flux de données trop important. Le chien se penche en avant en poussant un léger grognement, mais se tient immobile aux côtés de son maître.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff's visors flicker continuously, as if he is trying to process an overwhelming influx of data. The dog leans forward with a slight growl, but then obediently goes still again at his master's side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les visières du cyber-mastiff clignotent, comme s'il tentait d'emmagasiner un flux de données trop important. Le chien se penche en avant en poussant un léger grognement, mais se tient immobile aux côtés de son maître.{/n}

languages.text: {n}サイバーマスチフのバイザーが絶えず明滅している。まるで圧倒的な量のデータを処理しようとしているかのようだった。犬はかすかに唸りながら前に身を乗り出すが、すぐに主人の傍らで大人しく静止した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff's visors flicker continuously, as if he is trying to process an overwhelming influx of data. The dog leans forward with a slight growl, but then obediently goes still again at his master's side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}サイバーマスチフのバイザーが絶えず明滅している。まるで圧倒的な量のデータを処理しようとしているかのようだった。犬はかすかに唸りながら前に身を乗り出すが、すぐに主人の傍らで大人しく静止した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Siber mastifin vizörleri, sanki aşırı miktarda veri işlemeye çalışıyormuş gibi sürekli yanıp sönüyor. Köpek, hafifçe hırlayarak öne doğru eğiliyor ama sonra efendisinin yanında itaatkâr bir şekilde hareketsiz durmaya dönüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff's visors flicker continuously, as if he is trying to process an overwhelming influx of data. The dog leans forward with a slight growl, but then obediently goes still again at his master's side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Siber mastifin vizörleri, sanki aşırı miktarda veri işlemeye çalışıyormuş gibi sürekli yanıp sönüyor. Köpek hafifçe hırlayarak öne doğru eğiliyor ama sonra efendisinin yanında yeniden itaatkar bir şekilde hareketsiz duruyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Visoren des Cyber-Mastiffs flackern ständig, als würde er versuchen, zu viele Daten zu verarbeiten. Der Hund lehnt sich mit leisem Knurren nach vorne, kommt dann aber gehorsam an der Seite seines Herren wieder zur Ruhe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff's visors flicker continuously, as if he is trying to process an overwhelming influx of data. The dog leans forward with a slight growl, but then obediently goes still again at his master's side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Visoren des Cyber-Mastiffs flackern ständig, als würde er versuchen, zu viele Daten zu verarbeiten. Der Hund lehnt sich mit leisem Knurren nach vorne, kommt dann aber gehorsam an der Seite seines Herren wieder zur Ruhe.{/n}
